Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (O'Hare Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare Branch) due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare Branch) due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
